attribute.description: Indicates the icon to be used. available list https://fontawesome.com/icons
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Indicates the id of menu link
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the URL to be used
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: It indicates the label to be used
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the target browser. Default: _self. Options: _self, _parent, _blank, namedeumiframe
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

tag.name: menuDropDown

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: It indicates the label to be used in dropdown root
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example:
<html:menu> <html:menuCollapse attachToSelector="#block1">
</html:menuCollapse> <html:menuCollapsable id="block1"> <html:menuDropDown label="Menu"> <html:menuDropDownItem label="Item 1" url="#"/> <html:menuDropDownDivider/> <html:menuDropDownItem label="Item 2" target="_blank" url="#"/> <html:menuDropDownItem icon="trash" label="Item 3" url="#"/> </html:menuDropDown> </html:menuCollapsable> </html:menu>

tag.description: Renders a menu item on dropdown
tag.name: menuDropDownItem

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the icon to be used in the menu icon. available list https://fontawesome.com/icons
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Indicates the URL to be used
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: It indicates the label to be used
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the target browser. Default: _self. Options: _self, _parent, _blank, namedeumiframe
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example:
<html:menu> <html:menuCollapse attachToSelector="#block1">
</html:menuCollapse> <html:menuCollapsable id="block1"> <html:menuDropDown label="Menu"> <html:menuDropDownItem label="Item 1" url="#"/> <html:menuDropDownDivider/> <html:menuDropDownItem label="Item 2" target="_blank" url="#"/> <html:menuDropDownItem icon="trash" label="Item 3" url="#"/> </html:menuDropDown> </html:menuCollapsable> </html:menu>

tag.description: Renders a menu collapsable content group
tag.name: menuCollapsable

attribute.description: Indicates the id of menu block to be collapsed
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the component name that triggers the menu group
attribute.name: attachTo

attribute.description: Indicates the id of component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the component selector that triggers the menu group
attribute.name: attachToSelector

tag.name: menu

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be fixed. Default none. Options : top,bottom
attribute.name: fixed

tag.example:
<html:menu> <html:menuCollapse attachToSelector="#block1">
</html:menuCollapse> <html:menuCollapsable id="block1"> <html:menuDropDown label="Menu"> <html:menuDropDownItem label="Item 1" url="#"/> <html:menuDropDownDivider/> <html:menuDropDownItem label="Item 2" target="_blank" url="#"/> <html:menuDropDownItem icon="trash" label="Item 3" url="#"/> </html:menuDropDown> </html:menuCollapsable> </html:menu>

tag.description: Renders a logo in the navigation menu in text format
tag.name: menuBrand

attribute.description: Indicates the URL to be called by clicking on the logo
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: It indicates the label to be used in brand logo
attribute.name: label

tag.name: menuDropDownDivider
tag.example: <html:menu> <html:menuDropDown label="Menu"> <html:menuItem label="Item 1" url="#"/> <html:menuSeparator/> <html:menuItem label="Item 2" url="#"/> <html:menuItem label="Item 3" url="#"/> </html:menuDropDown> </html:menu>
